title: Beach tour and surfboards for rent in Lima, Peru
description: Surfers are sure to have a great time in Lima with this rental or surf trip. If you’re looking for equipment, choose the rental option for all the equipment needed to catch some waves on the Pacific Ocean. If you want something more in-depth, take a trip to the southern beaches for a full day of surfing with a small group of intermediate surfers.
all_descriptions: Surfers are sure to have a great time in Lima with this rental or surf trip. If you’re looking for equipment, choose the rental option for all the equipment needed to catch some waves on the Pacific Ocean. If you want something more in-depth, take a trip to the southern beaches for a full day of surfing with a small group of intermediate surfers.

ItinerarySurf rent includes all the necessary equipment: wetsuit, boots (aqua shoes) and of course all types of surfboards: longboards, fun boards or short boards. Surf rent is free time duration, people used to stay a couple of hours but feel free to use the equipment as long as you can.

If you prefer a full surf day at beach, ask for our Surftrip to the south, 1 hour distance from Lima in Playa Puerto Viejo Km. 71. The service includes round trip transportation in our 12-passenger van, we provide all the necessary equipment to surf there and the secrets about this spot. We leave Makaha beach at 8am and return 4pm. Minimum 3 people. Please contact us on WhatsApp to arrange details.

Cto. de Playas 5, Lima 15074, PeruAfter going down stairs, PUKANA SURF TENT is on the shores and right in the middle of Makaha Beach, in front of Terrazas Tennis Club. For your safety, please DON'T BELIEVE BEACH VENDORS, it is a tourist scam. Please contact us on WhatsApp to be sure you are in the right place.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider:
Pukana Surf school

reviews.title: Friendly Surf Rental!
reviews.text: My friends and I rented gear to surf, while on vacation in Lima. The owner and his staff were super friendly and helpful getting us set up. Prices were super affordable and it was nice not having a time limit. Good selection of boards and wetsuits. Would definitely recommend renting from these guys!

reviews.title: Unbelievable team with very friendly and professional teachers
reviews.text: I rented surf boards during 5 months and I can say that the Pukana team is the best team you can find in Lima. Friendly, honest, helpful, useful. Always with the smile, it is impossible not to have a good moment with them. Many friend of mine took classes there and they improved quite quickly thanks to the good advices of the teachers.Also went to several surf trips at a few hours from Lima and was really well-organised.Big thanks especially to Javier and Lorenzo, los jefes de la playa !!

reviews.title: Top notch experience
reviews.text: Such a great experience. Called up for hire of a board and wetsuit and was greeted with big smiles and loads of Stoke.I didn’t require a lesson so just hired a wetsuit and board. There was a good selection of boards and Javier and the guys were quick to invite me for a session elsewhere. We drive to a spot down the road with pumping waves and good vibes in the water.I had some quality surf shots taken that will definitely be going in the collection.Many thanks Javier and crew, I felt like one of your surfing buddy’s and not a customer.I highly recommend paying these guys a visit. 10/10

reviews.title: Amazing experience for surfers of ALL skill levels
reviews.text: Amazing experience with Javier! They took us to a very I crowded break that was perfect for our skill levels and had the right surfboard for all levels. Afterwards, they took us to the best chicken restaurant I have ever been to. They are all very nice and great surfers.

reviews.title: Professionals
reviews.text: These folks have surfing in their hearts and want to share their passion for the sport. Every time I have friends coming to Lima, I take them here. The staff is very professional, and you will fall in love with surfing and the Peruvian ocean after surfing with them. Gracias Pukana 🤙🏾

reviews.title: Experienced surfer enjoying Peruvian surf with familia.
reviews.text: After spending 5 days touring Cusco through Machu Picchu, we made our way back to Lima to spend the rest of our vacation.  And of the activities we enjoyed while in Peru was surfing.  Being an experienced surfer from Hawaii, I was looking for a rental operation that would rent decent fiberglass performance surfboards and not the typical heavy/slow rental boards.  Based on earlier reviews, I emailed Pukana Surf who promptly replied and readily accommodated my request for performance surfboards with one of Peru's top surfboard brands - Klimax.  When I arrived, I was greeted by Javier who was looking out for my arrival since there are other competing rental outfits along the same shoreline.  They have the most professional looking tent and large cargo truck as so they are in my opinion most legitimate.  More so after renting the boards and asking them to give surf lessons to my Peruvian relatives.  I would have taught them the same way back in Hawaii.  There seem to be standard association rental rates that they had to abide by since the other tents had the same rate poster.  Still very reasonable.  And the quality and extras make Pukana the best deal.  Getting to Playa Makaja can be a bit challenging however.  Without knowing better, a 20 minute taxi ride from Montericco costed 50 soles.  Should have been more like 20 soles.  Pukana offers pickups and so it might be an better option if you have time to coordinate it.  Aloha!
